choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews

### Response:


Sure, here is a healthy meal plan for you for the week:

Monday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with spinach, kale, banana, and frozen berries (no almonds or pistachios)
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (e.g. broccoli, bell peppers, zucchini) and hummus on the side
- Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and steamed asparagus (no garlic or honey)

Tuesday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and granola (no almonds or pistachios)
- Lunch: Veggie wrap made with hummus, avocado, cucumber, tomato, and lettuce
- Dinner: Lentil soup with a side salad (e.g. spinach, arugula, kale)

Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with banana, frozen berries, and almond milk (no honey or pistachios)
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potato and steamed broccoli (e.g. no garlic)
- Dinner: Baked vegetable stir fry with tofu and brown rice (no almonds or pistachios)

Thursday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and granola (no almonds or pistachios)
- Lunch: Veggie wrap made with hummus, avocado, cucumber, tomato, and lettuce
- Dinner: Grilled salmon with quinoa and roasted asparagus (e.g. no garlic or honey)

Friday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with spinach, kale, banana, and frozen berries (no almonds or pistachios)
- Lunch: Veggie wrap made with hummus, avocado, cucumber, tomato, and lettuce
- Dinner: Lentil soup with a side salad (e.g. spinach, arugula, kale)

Saturday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and granola (no almonds or pistachios)
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potato and steamed broccoli (e.g. no garlic)
- Dinner: Baked vegetable stir fry with tofu and brown rice (no almonds or pistachios)

Sunday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and granola (no almonds or pistachios)
- Lunch: Veggie wrap made with hummus, avocado, cucumber, tomato, and lettuce
- Dinner: Grilled salmon with quinoa and roasted asparagus (e.g. no garlic or honey)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.
